Side Effects: I've been using a nasal spray for over five years. Broke a bone last year_ had full body x-ray that showed no improvement in bone density.  This after also taking calcium.  Really disappointed.Don't know whether to try anything else.

Comments: I've taken both Fortical and the generic Calcitonin Salmon and have not experienced any side effects. The Fortical smelled a little pungent_ but I got used to it.  For some reason the generic doesn't have that smell. I am very relieved to find a medication that I can tolerate so well.  Hopefully it will help with the bone loss.
One of the oldest and best meds for this condition....
